subtitle: This recipe uses quorn and lentils for a really satisfying vegetarian meal.

method.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add the onion, garlic, celery and carrot. Saute together for 5 min or until softened slightly.
Stir the quorn into the pan. Season to taste. Stir in the tomato puree, stock and lentils. Bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to a simmer and cook gently for 15 min or until lentils are tender.
Meanwhile, cook the potato in a pan of boiling water for 8-10 min or until tender. Drain thoroughly. Mash with the butter and cheese until smooth. Season to taste. Set aside and keep warm.
Stir the peas and herbs into the quorn mixture. Spoon into the base of an ovenproof dish.
Top the cottage pie mixture with the cheesy mashed potato. Smooth over the surface. Run the back of a fork through it to give a pattern.
Cook in the oven for 30 min or until crisp and golden.

title: Meat-free cottage pie
